title: GOV.UK transforms its search function with help from Google Cloud
summary: TL;DR: The UK government's website, GOV.UK, upgraded its search functionality using Google Cloud's technology.  This resulted in faster, more accurate, and more relevant search results for users.

title: How Honeywell is using Google AI to prepare for the industrial future
summary: TL;DR: Honeywell is using Google Cloud AI to improve efficiency and safety in its industrial operations, leveraging machine learning for predictive maintenance, optimizing processes, and enhancing worker safety.
